net.sourceforge.jabm.agent
Interface Agent

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAgent
public interface Agent
extends EventListener

A simulated agent. Every agent has a strategy, which specifies the behaviour of the agent.
